page.title: 08LOCAL HISTORY OF AREA
page.content: THIS IS A VERY HISTORIC AREA WITH MUCH OF IT LYING ALONG THE ROUTE OF { {HADRIANS WALL }MANY OF THE FARM BUILDINGS AND WALLS ARE MADE FROM ROMAN STONES,BECAUSE IT WAS READILY AVAILABLE AND ALREADY CUT TO THE RIGHT SIZE AND SHAPE.THIS IS ONE REASON WHY SO LITTLE OF THE WALL REMAINS TODAY. THERE ARE TWO RUINS IN THE AREA,ONE A MILL AND THE OTHER OF LONKINS HALL. A {LEGEND }EXISTS ABOUT {WHITTLE DENE} WHICH STATES THAT DURING THE {JACOBITE {UPRISINGS OF 1715 OR 1745 }A NOBLEMAN HID THE FAMILYS JEWELS AND TREASURES IN THE STREAM WITHOUT TELLING HIS FAMILY WHERE THEY WERE.UNFORTUNATELY FOR THEM HE NEVER RETURNED FROM THE FIGHTING AND THE JEWELS ARE STILL SEARCHED FOR TODAY,MAINLY BY SMALL BOYS.
